NHL Schedule

nhl_schedule.Rd

Returns NHL Schedule data

nhl_schedule(season = NULL, day = as.Date(Sys.Date(), "%Y-%m-%d"))

Arguments

season

NHL Season
day

Date

Value

Returns a tibble

Examples

# \donttest{
  nhl_schedule(season = 2021)
#>         game_id                              link game_type_abbreviation
